sentence.Network_en: He published only three slim volumes of verse in his short life.
sentence.Network_cn: 在他短暂的一生里，他只出版过3卷薄薄的诗集。

sentence.Network_en: Richard told me of three 16th-century folio volumes on alchemy.
sentence.Network_cn: 理查德告诉过我16世纪的三卷关于炼金术的对开本书籍的事。

sentence.Network_en: What you wear speaks volumes about you.
sentence.Network_cn: 你的衣着能传递很多关于你的信息。

PerfectNetExp.abs: 数据体量（volumes）即将超越传统数据库的管理能力目前的 1、 苹果公司战略中的哪些关键要素使得iPod在众多替代产品存在的情况 …

entry.def: The volume of something is the amount of it that there is.

example.ex: Senior officials will be discussing how the volume of sales might be reduced.
example.tran: 高层领导将要讨论销售量如何削减。

example.ex: ...the sheer volume of traffic and accidents.
example.tran: 交通流量之大、事故之多

entry.def: The volume of an object is the amount of space that it contains or occupies.

example.ex: It is 2,300 metres above sea level, so a given volume of air contains only about one-third as much oxygen as it would at sea level...
example.tran: 这是在海拔2,300米的高空，因此一定体积空气的含氧量只有海平面处的约1/3。

example.ex: When egg whites are beaten they can rise to seven or eight times their original volume.
example.tran: 蛋清打散后，体积可增至原来的七八倍。

entry.def: A volume is one book in a series of books.
A volume is a collection of several issues of a magazine, for example all the issues for one year.

entry.tran: （广播、电视或音响系统的）音量，声量,响度
entry.def: The volume of a radio, television, or sound system is the loudness of the sound it produces.

example.ex: He came to complain about the volume of the music.
example.tran: 他过来抱怨音乐的音量太高了。

entry.tran: 清楚表明;详尽说明;充分说明
entry.def: If something such as an action speaks volumes about a person or thing, it gives you a lot of information about them.

example.ex: What you wear speaks volumes about you...
example.tran: 你的衣着能传递很多关于你的信息。
他们的缺席已经充分说明了问题。

auth_sentence.content: Trading volumes in the futures market hit a record.

auth_sentence.content: That will feed through into better volumes for us.
auth_sentence.res_content: That will feed through into better volumes for us.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: That will feed through into better volumes for us.

auth_sentence.content: Gossip and trading volumes have been building for months.

Sentence.sentence: So far, Google has scanned more than 10 million titles from libraries in America and Europe - including half a million volumes held by the Bodleian in Oxford.
